thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 17 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Tenneco Sees FY 2018 Revenue Up 5 Percent

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Tenneco Sees FY 2018 Revenue Up 5 Percent
text:
Jan 17 (Reuters) - Tenneco Inc:
* SEES FY 2018 REVENUE UP 5 PERCENT * - COMPANY EXPECTS 2018 REVENUE GROWTH OF 5 PERCENT * - 2018 REVENUE GROWTH TO BE DRIVEN BY INCREASES IN BOTH RIDE PERFORMANCE AND CLEAN AIR PRODUCT LINES
* - ANNOUNCED ITS REVENUE GUIDANCE FOR 2019 AND 2020 * - EXPECTS TO “OUTPERFORM” INDUSTRY PRODUCTION BY 4% TO 6% IN 2019
* - ‍ EXPECTS TO “OUTPERFORM” INDUSTRY PRODUCTION IN REVENUE BY 3% TO 5% IN 2020 ​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
